data.name: Cyber Sex
data.detailed_description:
Are you ready for this wonderful VR experience?
Fly in this futuristic world, full of lights, neons, huge buildings, and flying cars, why not have holograms of beautiful, naked women for you to enjoy this ride?

The controls are the most varied. Use your keyboard, mouse, or joystick. You can also use the control of your VR device. Whatever is best for you!

The scenario simulates a futuristic city with many advertisements and beautiful and hot models for you to enjoy!

You can fly with two different ships to explore every corner of this wonderful city!

To unlock the models, you need to go through portals scattered throughout the city. Nothing too complicated but really fun and pretty to look at.

Get ready to have a great flight and fall in love!

data.short_description: Are you ready for this wonderful VR experience? Fly in this futuristic world, full of lights, neons, huge buildings, and flying cars, why not have holograms of beautiful, naked women for you to enjoy this ride?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista (32 bit or 64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default

content_descriptors.notes:
A lot of sexy models, all naked, in sex positions. 
Some are sexy and some are very explicit.
